snippet.title: Fine Cooking Italian: 200 Recipes for Authentic Italian Food
snippet.description: Features two hundred recipes for Italian home cooking for soups, salads, pizza, pasta, main courses, polenta and risotto, desserts, and more, with step-by-step instructions with photos for cooking techniques and ingredient profiles.
